CAU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview Senior Research Fellow Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 11:38 IST
 Central Agricultural University
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Meghalaya |  Salary : 37,000 to 37,000




FOLLOW

Central Agricultural University (CAU) has announced the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., B.E/ B.Tech, and Post Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the CAU Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Meghalaya.

CAU Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria

Name of the Posts

	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Research Fellow 	01	M.Sc, B.E/ B.Tech, Post Graduation

Age Limit for the CAU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 40 years.

Selection Process for the CAU Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the CAU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 37,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the CAU Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the CAU Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Senior Research Fellow Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, send your CV to the email address mentioned in the official notification.

Important Dates

Last Date of Application	18-08-2025
Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
